summary.para: Describes the subresource from a cube texture to use in a shader-resource view.

remarks.para: This structure is one member of a shader-resource-view description, .

summary.para: Index of the most detailed mipmap level to use; this number is between 0 and MipLevels (from the original TextureCube for which creates a view) -1.
The maximum number of mipmap levels for the view of the texture. See the remarks in .
Set to -1 to indicate all the mipmap levels from MostDetailedMip on down to least detailed.
A value to clamp sample LOD values to. For example, if you specify 2.0f for the clamp value, you ensure that no individual sample accesses a mip level less than 2.0f.
